means: 影响( affect的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His reason had been permanently affected by what he had witnessed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他所目睹的那一幕永久性地影响了他的神智。

sentence.Network_en: Water supplies and other public utilities were badly affected.
sentence.Network_cn: 供水以及其他公用事业受到了严重影响。

sentence.Network_en: Vitamins in solution are more affected than those in solid foods.
sentence.Network_cn: 溶液里的维生素比固体食物里的维生素受到的影响更大。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... aesthetic n. 美学 affected adj. 假装的, 做作的 affection n. 爱,情感.
Fishermen have been against going out to sea in affected areas , Kompas said., 这家报纸还说 , 政府劝告受灾地区的渔民不要出海.
Smoking and Health_英语论文范文_英文阅读网 ... female = 女性的； affected = 受到影响的； breathe= 呼吸；.

entry.def: If you describe someone's behaviour as affected, you disapprove of the fact that they behave in an unnatural way that is intended to impress other people.

example.ex: She had an affected air and a disdainful look.

means.word_mean: 2. speaking or behaving in an artificial way to make an impression

auth_sentence.content: Hyundai has said it will compensate the affected buyers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hyundai has said it will compensate the affected buyers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hyundai has said it will compensate the affected buyers.

auth_sentence.content: Men are more likely to be affected than women.
auth_sentence.res_content: Men are more likely to be affected than women.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Men are more likely to be affected than women.

auth_sentence.content: Women tend to be affected more often than men.
auth_sentence.res_content: Women tend to be affected more often than men.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Women tend to be affected more often than men.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受到影响的,不自然的,假装的
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ed……的→被影响的
affection[n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适]+ate……的→adj.挚爱的,充满感情的
affect情感+ive……的→adj.情感的,表达感情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象
stems_affixes.word_buile: effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+ive……的→adj.有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象

stems_affixes.value_cn: 传染的,传染性的,有感染力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infect传染+ious……的→adj.传染的,传染性的,有感染力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的
disaffect[v.使不满意,使疏远]+ed……的→adj.[政治上]不满的,叛离的
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ion表名词→n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
confect[v.调制,n.西点,糖果]+ion某种物→n.甜食,糖果

stems_affixes.value_cn: 糖果制造人, 糖果店
stems_affixes.word_buile: confection[n.甜食,糖果]+ery场所→n.糖果制造人, 糖果店
de坏+fect做,制作→做坏了→缺陷
de坏+fect做+ion表名词→做坏事
affect感动+ation表名词→做出的感动→做作
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
infect[v.传染,感染;影响[思想等]]+ion状态→n.感染,传染;传染病
perfect[adj.完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的 v.使完美]+ion表名词→n.尽善尽美,完美
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
dis分开+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+u+ate表动词→v.实行,完成
in进入+fect做,制作→做进去→传染进去
per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的

Sentence.sentence: What did Steve Jobs do that most deeply affected people's way of life?
Along with the deaths, the report said that the lives of 325 million people, primarily in poor countries, were being seriously affected by climate change.
Improve the welfare of affected workers.
Women's working time is influenced by the number and age of their children, but men's working time is not affected by these factors.
It has affected house owners more than stock holders.
Two strains of the disease, with almost identical symptoms, affected humans-Ebola-Zaire and Ebola-Sudan.

means.word_mean: (人或行为)假装的；做作的；不自然的

sentences.cn: 他认为她的笑是装出来的。

sentences.en: They were well affected towards the speaker’s cause.
sentences.cn: 他们对讲演人所倡导的诗也有好感。

means.word_mean: 受到(疾病等)侵袭的，感染的

sentences.en: All scheduled airline services will be affected by the strike.
sentences.cn: 所有定期航班服务都将受到罢工的影响。

means.word_mean: 感动的，感受的，(情绪)激动的，被打动的

sentences.en: She was deeply affected by the sad story.
sentences.cn: 她被那个悲伤的故事深深感动了。

sentences.en: What he said deeply affected the people present.
sentences.cn: 他说的话深深地感动了在场的人。
